info.title: Azure ML Web Services Management Client
info.description:
These APIs allow end users to operate on Azure Machine Learning Web Services resources. They support the following operations:
  • Create or update a web service
  • Get a web service
  • Patch a web service
  • Delete a web service
  • Get All Web Services in a Resource Group
  • Get All Web Services in a Subscription
  • Get Web Services Keys

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: Name of the resource group in which the web service is located.

WebServiceNameParameter.name: webServiceName
WebServiceNameParameter.description: The name of the web service.

APIVersionParameter.name: api-version
APIVersionParameter.description: The version of the Microsoft.MachineLearning resource provider API to use.
